purpose.para: This function compares the given two strings and returns an integral value that indicates the relationship between them.

description.para: Calling this function is equivalent to calling strcmp if bchar is defined as char or to calling wcscmp if bchar is defined as wchar_t. If the first string is lexicographically less than the second the return value is negative, if the first string is lexicographically greater than the second the return value is positive, if the strings are equal then the return value is zero.
